meanings.definition: A type of decorative art or design characterized by intricate patterns and geometric shapes.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful moresques on the walls.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate moresques on the ancient vase.
meanings.sent3: The moresques on the tablecloth seemed to dance when she looked at them.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas of moresques, each thought a delicate pattern.
meanings.sent5: The moresques etched in her memory were as vivid as a dream.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the style of art known as moresques.
meanings.sent1: The artist used moresques patterns in his latest painting.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with moresques curtains and rugs.
meanings.sent3: His moresques tie clashed amusingly with his striped shirt.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a moresques silhouette against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The moresques details added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A person who creates or studies moresques.
meanings.sent1: The moresques expert shared insights into the art form.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a renowned moresques artist.
meanings.sent3: The young moresques enthusiast spent hours sketching patterns.
meanings.sent4: He was a true moresques aficionado, collecting rare pieces.
meanings.sent5: The moresques masterpieces in the gallery fascinated visitors.
